name: Charlie the Chronocurator
description:
Charlie has been left a museum by an old friend. Although empty, the museum does possess the means to travel to a couple of different good times for picking up museum exhibits. Help Charlie rifle through the dustbin of history in search of new exhibits for the museum.

Code & Level Design by Norgg https://norgg.itch.io/

Narrative Design by Fergus Doyle https://mrfergusdoyle.itch.io/

Sprites by Kenney https://kenney.nl 

Music by Rest! https://richarrest.itch.io/

Made in 2 weeks for AdvXJam 2020.
